landing_title: Where Culinary Artistry Meets Asian Tradition
landing_subtitle: Experience a symphony of flavors, where every dish is a masterpiece and every moment is a celebration.
landing_story_p: At Steam, we blend time-honored Asian culinary traditions with a modern twist. Our philosophy is simple: use the freshest ingredients, honor the authentic flavors, and create an unforgettable dining experience. Every dish is a work of art, crafted with passion and precision.
landing_taste_p: From delicate dim sum to sizzling main courses, our menu is a journey through the flavors of Asia.
landing_taste_item1_p: Hand-crafted parcels of joy, steamed or pan-fried to perfection.
landing_taste_item2_p: Lightly seared A5 Wagyu, served with a citrus-soy dressing.
landing_taste_item3_p: A delicate and flavorful classic, marinated for 48 hours.
menu_subtitle: A symphony of flavors, where tradition meets innovation.
review_modal_login_alert: You must be logged in to leave a review.
reservations_subtitle: Secure your table at Steam for an unforgettable dining experience. Please fill out the form below to proceed.
reservations_policy: By clicking "Confirm Reservation", you agree to our reservation policy. A confirmation email will be sent to the address provided.
register_error_exists: An account with this email already exists.
profile_subtitle: Here you can view your order and reservation history.
profile_loyalty_error_insufficient: Not enough points to redeem this amount.

menu_item_1_description: $80pp (Minimum 2 people). Includes: Duck pancakes, Pork gyoza, Bao bun (pork or chicken), Chicken spring rolls, San choy bow. Choose one main: Chicken Sambal (spicy), Pork Belly braised, or Beef Bulgogi. Chef’s choice dessert.
menu_item_2_description: $75pp (Minimum 2 people). Includes: Crispy tofu, Vegetable gyoza, Veg sushi roll. Choose one main: Nasi Goreng, Pad Thai, or Thai Vegan curry. Chef’s choice dessert.
menu_item_3_description: $100pp (Minimum 2 people). Includes: Chinese dumplings, Calamari, Wagyu Beef dumplings, Chicken satay, Duck pancakes. Choose one main: Eye fillet, greens, Beef Bulgogi, Duck curry, or Pork Belly braised. Chef’s choice dessert.
menu_item_4_description: $100pp (Minimum 2 people). Includes: Salmon Nigiri, Kingfish dressed, Scallop dressed, Prawn dumplings, Calamari. Choose one main: Seafood Curry, Barramundi, or Seafood-on-hot-plate. Chef’s choice dessert.
menu_item_5_description: Freshly shucked, served with lemon & condiments. (3 for $16 | 6 for $30 | 12 for $50)
